data.text: Maelufu ga bandu ngabakongananga pamwe mpaka kulebatana, Yesu ngabalenge oti akinapunji bakwe, “Mme maha na maboulo ga Mafalisayo ga uwangi.
Kila chikiekeligwe kiba kuekuligwa, na changamanyikana makimanyikana.
Uyo goa agannongi pulubendu, bandu mabagajoa pukongolou, na gowa agannyojela kingobu milyango mujigale, magatangachigwa pikinyanga.
“Nannenge makaganja bango, makajogopaje abakoma mmele, kubapenia kuotolangaje kutenda chenge kilebe.
Mananangila ju kunnyogopa, mannyogopange Nnoongo jwombe kuboka pukoma, akweti kinala chu kunneke kumwoto gwangaimika machoba goa. Nhwamina ne, jwenio nga ju kunnyogopa!
“Imanyakine kube iyebele nhwano iyuchigwa kwa yumuni komi, yeneje? Nambu Nnoongo kikilibalije wala chimwe.
Nambu ata nywili ya mutwe gwinu aibalangigwe yoa. Yene makapwelelaje, mangweto mambone kupeta iyebele ijingi.
“Nannenge kweli, kila mundu ojwanyeketela pabandu kutenda jwenio nga jwango, Mwana jwa Mundu mannyeketela nnongi ja akapakachi ba Nnoongo kutenda mundu ojo nga jwango.
Nambu mundu jwajotijola ojwambakungana nnongi ja bandu, jwombe makanaligwa nnongi ja akapakachi ba Nnoongo.
“Jwajotijola ojwalenga lilobe lyu kunkana Mwana jwa Mundu malekekiigwa, nambu ojwantukana Uhuke jwa Chwapi alekekiigwaje.
“Pabampeleka mangweto nnongi ja nyumba ja kugongalela nnongi ja akatawala na bina kinala, makapweleje kilebe champakulongela andaje champakulongela.
Magambu Uhuke jwa Chwapi, kingobucho mammola mangweto chu kulongela.”
Mundu jumwe ojwakiba pamwe na bandu bala ngannenge Yesu, “Aboli, mannengele nunugwango tubagane ulichi ugubutuleki Awawa bito.”
Yesu nganyanga, “Maganja bango, beneke abambi ne kube nahakimu ba ilebe andaje nachikachani panakati jinu?”
Ngabalengela boa, “Mmagange maha na tama, gambu bwomi gwa mundu uhyobale kube ni milebe eiyakwetije, wala uloi guba kube.”
Kubokapenia ngabalengela kulandanakia gongo, “Pakiba na mundu juna uloi ojwakweti nng'onda guipambike ilyo ndu.
Mundu jwenio ngawacha kumojo gwakwe, ‘Ndenda bo nenga? Ngwetije paali pa kubeka mauno goa gano?
Ngakilenge mwene, ndenda yene,’ ‘Momolana ikokwe yango nukuchenga kikokwe kikolongwa muno, mwenio mameka ilyo yango yoa ni ilebe yango.
Kuboka penia nikilengela namwene. Ngoeno nkweti lupambo lwa kutumia kwa yaka na yaka. Kutama na bwomi kutama kwa mbone, kulye, nukunywe nukube na laa!’
Nambu Nnoongo ngannengela, ‘Mwe majinga! Lele kilo bwomi gwinu mautoligwa. Na ilebe yoa yenie eimikibekile maiba yabeneke?’ ”
Yesu ngajomole kulenga, “Ngapibile kwa mundu ojwakibekela uloi magambu gakwe mwene, nambu jwenio kileje nnongi ja Nnoongo.”
Kubokapenia Yesu ngabalenge akinapunji bakwe, “Na yene nannenge makapwelejekwa nhwalo gwa chakulya chimikipala kwa bwomi gwinu na ngobo imipala kwa mmele gwinu.
Bwomi kilebe cha mbone kupeta chakulya nammele nga gwambone kupeta ngobo.
Milibone likongolo, kupandaje mbeju, wala kuunaje na wala ikokwe gakwetije Nnoongo kagalichanga ilyo genia! Mangweto mmi mambone kupeta ijuni!
Bene kati jinu kwa kube na mbwele kuotola kujonjekea bwomi gwakwe? Anda kuotojekilebe hata kichokochoko kwa nike kupwelela kwa ilebe yenge?
Anda kuotojekilebe hata kichokochoko kwa nike kupwelela kwa ilebe yenge?
Magabonange maloba ga mpongote apagamalika, kamwaje maengo na kulokaje. Nambu nannenge, mwene Nngwana Solomoni mukibumo chakwe choa akwinditije chwapi andi maloba aga.
Anda Nnoongo alikwindia yene manyai ga mung'onda agabi leleno na malabo galekeligwa pa mwoto, bo bantendelangaje muno mangweto? Mangweto mabandu bina imani njoko yankweti!”
“Yene makapweleje nukuwacha, nniaganga nike andaje nywaganga nike.
Kwa bandu boa bangammanya Nnoongo machoba goa bagabegelela genia goa. Awawa binu bukumbengu bagamanyi goa gampalanga.
Mikibegelelange oti Kingwana cha Nnoongo, na genia gowa mabampaganga.”
“Makajogopangaje, mangweto kikuta kichoko cha akinapunji bango! Gambu Awawa binu bukumbengu bapala kumpe Kingwana.

Nhwuchange yoa eyankwetingite makapegange akanhocho ela yenie. Mijibeke miuku jinu kube chwapi na kukibekela lupambo kumbengu jenie Kwenio jipungukaje, magambu kwenio akabwii kuotoje kujipata na gabije mabongo agaotwi kualabia.
Penia apalubi lupambo lwinu nga apaupakube mwojo gwinu.”
“Mmegange tela kwa goa na muli yinu ibe ikajaka,
mmegange anda akabanda abalendela angwana babe babuje kuboka kumpapala bajogolele nniango kingobucho echikipaligwe pabapakugomba oti.
Mbaya akabanda ababakakole angwana babe babilingite mio kalenda! Nannenge kweli, benia mabikipangania kabegelela, nakalenge ntamange pukulye na benia kabegelela.
Anda bakabuja panakati ja kilo andaje puiku na kakolela bakakelukianga mbaya jabe akabanda benia!
Mmanyange kube ikabi nkolanyumba akamanyi kingobu mwihi chapakuika, kabi akelukie, na kabi ajilekitije nyumba jakwe jibomaligwe.
Ata mangweto mmegange tela, gambu Mwana jwa Mundu maika mangobu gangamanyika.”
Petulo ngalenga, “Angwana, kulandanakia kwenio magambu ga bandu boa?”
Angwana ngabajanga, “Meneke ojwabi mpakachi jwaaminike na jwambone? Jwenio ananhota bakwe mabammeka alolele akabanda bakwe ibe bape chakulya kingobu echikipaligwa.
Mbaya mpakachi jwojo jubakunkole ananhota mundu akakamula genia!
Kweli mampa kugoya ilebe yakwe yoa.
Nambu anda mpakachi jwenio akilenge mwene, ‘Ananhota bango batenda kuchelwa kubuja,’ kingobucho nu kutumbu kaputanga abanda ajakwe, akinalome na akikege, nukulye nukunywe nukulobela,
ananhota mundu bibuja lichoba lyangamanyika ni kingobu changamanyika, nu kunhweketa ipande ibena, nu kummeke lipungu lyakwe pamwe na bandu banga amini.
“Mmanda ojwamanyi echibapala ananhota bakwe nambu kamwaje andi ipabapala ananhotamundu abakuputigwa muno.
Nambu mmanda jwenio ojwatenda gangapala ananhota bakwe nambu amanyije agabapala anahota bakwe maputigwa kachoko. Ojubampi ijingi malongigwa ijingi, ojubampi kachoko malongigwa kachoko.
“Nhikila kupamba mwoto padunia, mbaya gwakabi ujakite!
Ngweti ubaticho gwa kupoteka ogumbaligwa nupokele, nubegelela kibegele nike ulenganile!
Nkitanga nhikila kuleta tengela padunia? Na kachokochokoje, tengelaje nambu kulekana.
Kutumbu ngoe, lungolo lwa bandu lukibagana, akatatu kati ja akabele, akabele kati ja akatatu.
Awawa bankana mwana jwabe munalome, mwana bakana Awamundu, Amama bankana mwana jwabe munkege, mwana munkege bakana amamamundu, akimundu akege bakana ajumbo na ajumbo bakana aniamundu akege.”
Yesu ngaulenge kabe nkengeni gwa bandu, “Apamagabona maunde gakapitila kingonu cha kundonde, nnenganga, ‘Ula majikoma,’ nakweli ukoma.
Apamubona upepo gukubanda gukagugumaga, nnenganga, ‘Mapaba niliuke lele,’ na kweli kube.
Mangwetomwe makandendemundu mmanyangite kulondola upepo na maunde ni ilebe yu kumbengu kwa nike kumanyaje mangobu ganga?
“Mbone kuotolangaje mmene kumanya minhalo ja mbone jukamula?

Maana anda jumunnemwite ampeleka kamaakama yakabi mbaya kwinu kuchikachana nakwe milingiti tango undela, ibe akaikaje kumpeleka nnongi ja akimu na akimu akampange ku nkolongwa jwa manjolinjoli, na angweto kummeka mukipungo.
Nannengela kweli, mpitaje mwenio mpaka apampakujomole kulepa senti ja kujomola ligambo linu.”
